Text: JPMorgan Chase & Co. raised its stake in shares of Customers Bancorp by 1,274.4% during the first quarter. JPMorgan Chase & Co. now owns 911,951 shares of the bank's stock valued at $16,697,000 after acquiring an additional 845,596 shares during the last quarter.
